entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kejimkujik (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:53 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kejimkujik Park 06:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: NE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning. Snow beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 cm. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h this evening then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 9.
